mapper.select:
SELECT lpad(cast((CAST(coalesce(MAX(substring(ckdh,LENGTH(ckdh)-strpos(reverse(ckdh),'-')+2,LENGTH(ckdh))),'0') AS numeric) + 1) as VARCHAR), 3, '0') serial FROM igams_ckgl
scbj = '0' AND ckdh like #{prefix}||'%'

select ckgl.ckid,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.ck,ckxx.ckdm,ckgl.ckrq,jcsj_ck.csdm as cklbcsdm,jgxx.jgdm as bmdm,ckgl.llr,xtyh_fl.zsxm as flrmc from igams_ckgl ckgl left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jgxx jgxx on jgxx.jgid=ckgl.bm and jgxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_ck on jcsj_ck.csid=ckgl.cklb left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_fl on xtyh_fl.yhid=ckgl.flr and xtyh_fl.scbj='0'
ckgl.llid=#{llid}

select ckgl.lrsj,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.zt,ckgl.bm,ckgl.llr,ckgl.flr,ckgl.ck,ckgl.ckrq,ckgl.cklb,ckgl.bz,ckxx.ckmc,jcsj_ck.csmc as cklbmc,xtyh_ll.zsxm as llrmc,xtyh_fl.zsxm as flrmc,llgl.lldh, ckgl.u8ckdh,bm.jgmc as bmmc,bm.jgdm bmdm from igams_ckgl ckgl left join matridx_jgxx bm on bm.jgid = ckgl.bm left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_ck on jcsj_ck.csid=ckgl.cklb left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_fl on xtyh_fl.yhid=ckgl.flr and xtyh_fl.scbj='0' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_ll on xtyh_ll.yhid=ckgl.llr and xtyh_ll.scbj='0' LEFT JOIN igams_llgl llgl ON llgl.llid = ckgl.llid AND llgl.scbj = '0'
ckgl.scbj!='1'
and ckgl.ckdh like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or ckxx.ckmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or jcsj_ck.csmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%'
and ckgl.ckdh like '%'||#{ckdh}||'%'
and ckxx.ckmc like '%'||#{ckmc}||'%'
and jcsj_ck.csmc like '%'||#{cklbmc}||'%'
and llgl.lldh like '%'||#{lldh}||'%'
and ckgl.zt = #{zt}

select ckgl.lrsj,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.jlbh,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.zt,ckgl.bm,ckgl.llr,ckgl.flr,ckgl.ck,ckgl.ckrq,ckgl.cklb,ckgl.bz,ckxx.ckmc,jcsj_ck.csmc as cklbmc,xtyh_ll.zsxm as llrmc,xtyh_fl.zsxm as flrmc,llgl.lldh, ckgl.u8ckdh,bm.jgmc as bmmc,bm.jgdm bmdm,shxx_sqsj, shxx_gwmc, shxx_lrryxm, shxx_shsj, shxx_sftg, shxx_shxxid,shxx_shyj from igams_ckgl ckgl left join matridx_jgxx bm on bm.jgid = ckgl.bm left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_ck on jcsj_ck.csid=ckgl.cklb left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_fl on xtyh_fl.yhid=ckgl.flr and xtyh_fl.scbj='0' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_ll on xtyh_ll.yhid=ckgl.llr and xtyh_ll.scbj='0' LEFT JOIN igams_llgl llgl ON llgl.llid = ckgl.llid AND llgl.scbj = '0' join
select #{item.ckid} ckid, #{item.shxx_shxxid} shxx_shxxid, #{item.shxx_sqsj} shxx_sqsj, #{item.sqr} sqr, #{item.shxx_lrryxm} shxx_lrryxm, #{item.shxx_shsj} shxx_shsj, #{item.shxx_sftg} shxx_sftg, #{item.shxx_gwmc} shxx_gwmc,#{item.shxx_shyj} shxx_shyj, #{index} rownum tmp on tmp.ckid = ckgl.ckid order by tmp.rownum

select ckgl.ckid,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.jlbh,ckgl.zt,ckgl.bm,ckgl.llr,ckgl.flr,ckgl.ck,ckgl.ckrq,ckgl.cklb,ckgl.bz,ckxx.ckmc,jcsj_ck.csmc as cklbmc,xtyh_ll.zsxm as llrmc,xtyh_fl.zsxm as flrmc,llgl.lldh, ckgl.u8ckdh,jcsj_djlx.csmc as djlxmc,jgxx.jgmc as bmmc,ckgl.djlx,jcsj_djlx.csdm as djlxdm,jcsj_ck.cskz1 as cklbcskz1 from igams_ckgl ckgl left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_ck on jcsj_ck.csid=ckgl.cklb left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_djlx on jcsj_djlx.csid=ckgl.djlx left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_fl on xtyh_fl.yhid=ckgl.flr and xtyh_fl.scbj='0' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_ll on xtyh_ll.yhid=ckgl.llr and xtyh_ll.scbj='0' LEFT JOIN matridx_jgxx jgxx ON jgxx.jgid = ckgl.bm LEFT JOIN igams_llgl llgl ON llgl.llid = ckgl.llid AND llgl.scbj = '0'
ckgl.scbj!='1'
and ckgl.ckdh like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or ckxx.ckmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or jcsj_ck.csmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or xtyh_fl.zsxm like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or ckgl.u8ckdh like '%'||#{entire}||'%'
and ckgl.ckdh like '%'||#{ckdh}||'%'
and ckgl.u8ckdh like '%'||#{u8ckdh}||'%'
and ckxx.ckmc like '%'||#{ckmc}||'%'
and jcsj_ck.csmc like '%'||#{cklbmc}||'%'
and llgl.lldh like '%'||#{lldh}||'%'
and jcsj_djlx.csid in
#{item}

select jgxx.jgdm,jgxx.jgmc,ckgl.llid,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.zt,ckgl.bm,ckgl.llr,ckgl.flr,ckgl.ck,ckgl.ckrq,ckgl.cklb,yhssjg.jgid as ssjg,ckgl.bz,ckxx.ckdm,ckxx.ckmc,jcsj_ck.csmc as cklbmc,xtyh_ll.zsxm as llrmc,xtyh_fl.zsxm as flrmc,llgl.lldh,ckgl.jlbh, llgl.sqrq sqrq,xtyh_sq.zsxm sqrmc,llgl.sqbm,sqbm.jgdm sqbmdm,sqbm.jgmc sqbmmc,ckgl.llid from igams_ckgl ckgl left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj='0' left join matridx_jcsj jcsj_ck on jcsj_ck.csid=ckgl.cklb left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_fl on xtyh_fl.yhid=ckgl.flr and xtyh_fl.scbj='0' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_ll on xtyh_ll.yhid=ckgl.llr and xtyh_ll.scbj='0' LEFT JOIN igams_llgl llgl ON llgl.llid = ckgl.llid left join matridx_xtyh xtyh_sq on xtyh_sq.yhid=llgl.sqry left join matridx_jgxx jgxx on jgxx.jgid=ckgl.bm left join matridx_jgxx sqbm on sqbm.jgid=llgl.sqbm left join matridx_yhssjg yhssjg on yhssjg.yhid = ckgl.lrry where ckgl.scbj!='1' and ckgl.ckid=#{ckid}

select ckxx.ckdm,ckgl.ckrq,jgxx.jgmc as bmmc,jgxx.jgdm,xtyh.zsxm,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.bz,ckgl.zt from igams_ckgl ckgl left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj!='1' left join matridx_jgxx jgxx on jgxx.jgid=ckgl.bm and jgxx.scbj!='1' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh on xtyh.yhid=ckgl.lrry and xtyh.scbj!='1' and sfsd!='1'
ckgl.scbj!='1'
and ckgl.ckid in
#{item}

select ckxx.ckdm,ckgl.ckrq,jgxx.jgmc as bmmc,jgxx.jgdm,xtyh.zsxm,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.bz,ckgl.zt from igams_ckgl ckgl left join igams_ckxx ckxx on ckxx.ckid=ckgl.ck and ckxx.scbj!='1' left join matridx_jgxx jgxx on jgxx.jgid=ckgl.bm and jgxx.scbj!='1' left join matridx_xtyh xtyh on xtyh.yhid=ckgl.lrry and xtyh.scbj!='1' and sfsd!='1'
ckgl.scbj!='1'
and ckgl.llid in
#{item}

SELECT lpad(cast((CAST(coalesce(MAX(substring(jlbh,LENGTH(jlbh)-strpos(reverse(jlbh),'-')+2,LENGTH(jlbh))),'0') AS numeric) + 1) as VARCHAR), 3, '0') serial FROM igams_ckgl
scbj = '0' AND jlbh like #{prefix}||'%'

SELECT fhgl.fhid, ckgl.ckid, ckgl.ckdh, ckgl.ckrq, ckxx.ckmc ckmc, jgxx.jgmc xsbmmc, ckgl.u8ckdh, to_char( fhgl.shsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) shrq, khgl.khmc kh, ckgl.bz, fhgl.shdz, sum (ckmx.cksl) sum_sl, zdr.zsxm zdrmc, shry.zsxm shrymc, fhgl.u8fhdh FROM igams_ckgl ckgl LEFT JOIN igams_fhgl fhgl ON ckgl.fhid = fhgl.fhid LEFT JOIN igams_ckxx ckxx ON ckxx.ckid = ckgl.ck LEFT JOIN matridx_jgxx jgxx ON jgxx.jgid = fhgl.xsbm left join igams_khgl khgl on khgl.khid=fhgl.kh left join igams_ckmx ckmx on ckmx.ckid=ckgl.ckid left join matridx_xtyh zdr on zdr.yhid=fhgl.jsr left join matridx_xtyh shry on shry.yhid=fhgl.shry
ckgl.scbj='0'
and ckgl.fhid in
#{item}
group by fhgl.fhid,ckgl.ckid,ckgl.ckdh,ckgl.ckrq,ckxx.ckmc,jgxx.jgmc ,ckgl.u8ckdh,fhgl.shsj,khgl.khmc,ckgl.bz,fhgl.shdz,zdr.zsxm,shry.zsxm
